name: GELF Input
description: Ingest Graylog Extended Log Format (GELF) payloads over TCP or UDP. Requires Seq 5.1+.

gelfAddress.helpText: The url (protocol, IP address and port) on which the input will listen for GELF payloads. The default is `udp://0.0.0.0:12201`. Specifying the protocol as `tcp` will listen on TCP instead of UDP.

certificatePath.helpText: The absolute path to a `.pem` certificate file to use for secure transport. This setting is only used when the protocol is TCP.

certificatePasswordPath.helpText: The absolute path to a `.pem` certificate file with the password for the certificate.

enableDiagnostics.helpText: Controls the verbosity of diagnostic logs produced by the server. When enabled metrics will be regularly sampled and written back to Seq.
